jobTitle: Hospice Care Planner (RN)- $7,500 Sign On Bonus!!!
jobDescription: Do you have a "Hospice Heart"? If your answer is yes, then you are just the nurse we are looking for. When days cannot be added to a life, we add life to remaining days. Our multidisciplinary teams offer culturally-sensitive, end-of-life and palliative care services to patients and their families at home or in assisted living communities, skilled nursing facilities and hospitals. Ask About Our Sign On Bonus!!! Working at various facilities including hosptials, nursing homes and clinics in an assigned territory, the Hospice/Palliative Home Care Planner is responsible for evaluating and establishing a plan of care for patients referred for home health services. The Planner will facilitate admission of referrals upon discharge from the hospital to a home care or facility program that meets the needs of the patient and family members.
